text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no person entitled to receive any benefit under subchapter I of this chapter on account of death incurred, an injury received, or disease contracted, or an injury or disease aggravated, in the performance of duty shall be entitled, because of the same death, injury, disease, or aggravation, to benefits under subchapter I of Chapter 81 of Title 5, United States Code.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 4-633.

1973 Ed., § 4-538.

References in Text

"Subchapter I of Chapter 81 of Title 5, United States Code" is codified at 5 U.S.C. § 8101 et seq.

DC CODE § 5-733

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Police and Firefighters Retirement and Disability. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Eligibility for benefits under federal law.
